# Copilot Instructions for AI Agents

**Project Status:**
This repository currently contains no source code, documentation, or project-specific instructions. Only version control and license files are present.

## Guidance for AI Agents
- There are no build, test, or run workflows to follow.
- No architectural patterns, conventions, or integration points are defined yet.
- If you are tasked with contributing, clarify project goals and request initialization details from the user.
- Revisit this file after code or documentation is added to provide actionable guidance.

## Next Steps
